title: Bus transportation
content: Is it possible to join the bus in the middle of the year? I heard the bus drivers are strict and wont let us join

comments.body: U can join if the bus is not full, generally no buses are full. First u need to talk in mrd office, phone numbers and all the details are attached in the notice board there..
Theres a window by which you need to pay usually at the start of the year.
